animeTitle: Detective Conan Movie 3 – The Last Magician of the Century
otherNames: Meitantei Conan: Seikimatsu no Majutsushi, Detective Conan Movie 3, 名探偵コナン 世紀末の魔術師
synopsis:
Kaitou Kid has left a note to the police that he intends to steal the Easter Egg of the Romanov Dynasty, which was found in the Suzuki corporation in Osaka.
Mouri Kogorou is on the force that tries to prevent him from doing that, and Conan of course follows. However, Kaitou is not the only one going after the egg.
